text: jullaikaga yeojadeul-ui simsulguj-eun yaegileul deul-eumae geu yeojadeul-ege janchileul bepulgo kal-eul jumyeo yoseb-e ge yeoindeul ap-eulo naola hayeossdeo la yeoindeul-i geuleul boja chan-yanghamyeo geudeul-ui songalag-eul jaleumae hananim iyeo jeohuileul jikyeojusoseo i bun-eun ingan-i anin hullyunghan cheonsaga anib nikka lago maldeulhayeossdeola
